entry.title: WIND WARNING , Esquimalt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 06:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Haro Strait late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
